EmailTemplate.name: Access Request Reminder
EmailTemplate.Body:
You have a pending work item that requires attention. Work Item: $workItemDescription
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- $!comment
EmailTemplate.Description: Email template used to notify work item owner of pending work item for access request.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property (also the name property) of the request WorkItem.

Argument.name: workItem
Argument.Description: The WorkItem object for the request.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Access Request requires completion of Work Item ID : $workItemName
